# GitHub Copilot Instructions for Alsouri Tech Site

You are working on **alsouri-tech-site-uk**, a personal technology portfolio and professional showcase website. This repository represents personal branding and thought leadership in AI, automation, and business technology.

- **Tech Industry Professionals** seeking expertise and collaboration

## üîß Development Patterns

### Code Quality

```html
<!-- Standard page structure -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Mohammad Al-souri - AI & Automation Expert</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Professional portfolio of Mohamed Alsouri, AI automation expert and entrepreneur behind ¬£2.4M+ revenue MoBot Enterprise.">
  
    <!-- OpenGraph for social sharing -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="Mohamed Alsouri - AI & Automation Expert">
    <meta property="og:description" content="AI automation expert and entrepreneur">
    <meta property="og:image" content="/assets/professional-headshot.jpg">
  
    <!-- Performance optimization -->
    <link rel="preload" href="/css/critical.css" as="style">
    <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//fonts.googleapis.com">
</head>
```

### Required Components for All Pages

**CRITICAL: Microsoft Teams Chatbot Widget**

Every HTML page MUST include the Microsoft Teams Customer Connect chatbot widget before the closing `</body>` tag:

```html
<!-- Teams Chatbot Widget -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://res.public.onecdn.static.microsoft/customerconnect/v1/7dttl/init.js" id="chatbot" environmentId="401c3481-def7-eeed-9246-b19d2a137409" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
</body>
</html>
```

**Implementation Rules:**
- Always add chatbot widget to new HTML pages
- Place immediately before closing `</body>` tag
- Widget appears in bottom-right corner automatically
- Environment ID: `401c3481-def7-eeed-9246-b19d2a137409`
- DO NOT modify the script src or environment ID
- Currently integrated on: index.html, alsouri-ltd.html, company-info.html, login-background-generator.html

- **Structured Data**: JSON-LD for rich snippets
- **Meta Tags**: Comprehensive meta tag optimization
- **Internal Linking**: Strategic content cross-linking
- **Image Optimization**: WebP format, alt text, lazy loading
